price: ߤߊ߲߫ ߸ ߢߌ߲߬ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߌߢߍ߲߫ ߠߋ߫ ߝߍ߬ ߘߋ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߟߏ߲߫ ߜߌߟߌ߲ ߕߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߕߐ߫
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi yuḥibbūna al-ʿājilata wayadharūna warāahum yawman thaqīlan
